sqlReaderQuery.value:
update stg.Config set MAX_LastUpdatedDate = '@{activity('GetMaxDatefromSourceTable_copy1').output.firstRow.MaxD}'
where table_name like '@{item().Table_Name}'

select '1'

update stg.Config set MAX_LastUpdatedDate = '@{activity('GetMaxDatefromSourceTable').output.firstRow.MaxD}' where table_name like '@{item().Table_Name}'

select '1'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingSalesRep
source(output(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Dept as string,
		CurrentFlag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimSalesKeyHistory
source(output(
		MAXKEY as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(SalesRep_Key) as MAXKEY from dbo.Dim_SalesRepHistory',
	format: 'query') ~> MAXKEY
DimSalesKeyHistory select(mapColumn(
		Dim_SalesRep_Key = SalesRep_Key,
		Dim_SalesRep_Number = SalesRep_Number,
		Dim_SalesRep_Name = SalesRep_Name,
		Dim_SalesRep_Dept = SalesRep_Dept,
		CurrentFlag,
		VerifyField
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumns
StagingSalesRep, MAXKEY join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MaxKeyJoin
MaxKeyJoin, RenameColumns lookup(SalesRep_Number == Dim_SalesRep_Number,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimTable
LookupDimTable split(isNull(Dim_SalesRep_Number),
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(New, Existing)
Split@New derive(EnabledFlag = 1) ~> AddEnabledFlag
AddEnabledFlag alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Split@Existing derive(uCurrentFlag = 0,
		VerifyField = "Update") ~> setUpdateFlag
setUpdateFlag filter(Dim_SalesRep_Key <= MAXKEY) ~> Filter1
Filter1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
Split@Existing derive(uCurrent_Flag = 1,
		VerifyField = "New") ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Dept as string,
		CurrentFlag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SalesRep_Number,
		SalesRep_Name,
		SalesRep_Dept = SalesRep_Department,
		CurrentFlag = EnabledFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertFlowSink
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Dept as string,
		CurrentFlag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SalesRep_Key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SalesRep_Number = Dim_SalesRep_Number,
		SalesRep_Name = Dim_SalesRep_Name,
		SalesRep_Dept = Dim_SalesRep_Dept,
		CurrentFlag = uCurrentFlag,
		VerifyField,
		SalesRep_Key = Dim_SalesRep_Key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateFlagSink
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Dept as string,
		CurrentFlag as integer,
		VerifyField as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SalesRep_Number,
		SalesRep_Name,
		SalesRep_Dept = SalesRep_Department,
		CurrentFlag = uCurrent_Flag,
		VerifyField
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertupdatedRecords

source(output(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as string,
		UnitPrice as float,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DataLakeSalesData
source(output(
		CID as integer,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReferenceStreamCustomerData
DerivedColumn1 split(UnitPrice<=10,
	UnitPrice>10 && UnitPrice<=20,
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitOnPrice@(Stream10, Stream20, StreamOthers)
Select1 derive(CustomerName = Name,
		InvoiceDate = toTimestamp(InvoiceDate,'MM-DD-YYYY HH:mm')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DataLakeSalesData, ReferenceStreamCustomerData lookup(CustomerID == CID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCustData
FilterQuantitymorethan4 select(mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country,
		Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
LookupCustData filter(Quantity>4) ~> FilterQuantitymorethan4
SplitOnPrice@Stream10 sink(input(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as double,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string,
		CustomerName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TobotdevlDB
SplitOnPrice@Stream20 sink(input(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as double,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string,
		CustomerName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToBotDevlsalesData20
SplitOnPrice@StreamOthers sink(input(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as double,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string,
		CustomerName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToSalesDataOthers

source(output(
		id as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Salary as double,
		Dept_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustData
source(output(
		id as integer,
		Dept_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DeptData
CustData, DeptData join(Dept_ID == DeptData@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
ChangeDepidColName split(equals(Dept_Name,'HR'),
	equals(Dept_Name, 'Finance'),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitBasedOnDept@(HRTable, FinanceTable)
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Cust_ID = CustData@id,
		Customer_Name,
		Salary,
		Dept_ID,
		Dept_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChangeDepidColName
SplitBasedOnDept@HRTable sink(input(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Cust_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Cust_ID,
		Cust_Name = Customer_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> toHRTable
SplitBasedOnDept@FinanceTable sink(input(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Cust_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToFinanceTable

source(output(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		UnitPrice as float,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesData
source(output(
		CID as integer,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustData
SalesData, CustData exists(CustomerID == CID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(input(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		UnitPrice as float,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dbo.SalesData'],
	mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLTable
